text:
If a PropertySetterException is thrown during setting of an object property, a
warning is logged but the log call is passed the 'cause' of the exception which 
is always null and therefore no cause is printed.  

Changing the log call to pass the PropertySetterException as a param leads to 
more useful output.
creator: andy.mcbride@dsl.pipex.com
andy.mcbride@dsl.pipex.com
text:
Created attachment 17506
patch to produce more useful error output

creator: carnold@apache.org
text: Did it slightly different in rev 372414.  Passed ex.rootCause if non-null, ex otherwise.
